alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 11:50PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Collier and western Hendry Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1150 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Big Corkscrew Island to near East Naples. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Felda, Orangetree, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Big Corkscrew Island, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, North Naples, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Lely, Bunker Hill, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, Quail Creek Estate and Lake Trafford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County
